control.common¶

This module contains common control functions and classes.

Module Contents¶

Classes¶

PWM

This class contains the duty ratio computation and the voltage estimation.

SpeedCtrl

Speed controller with the disturbance-observer structure. This controller

RateLimiter

A class used to implement a rate limiter.

Datalogger

This class contains the data logger.

Functions¶

duty_ratios(u, u_dc)

Duty ratios for three-phase PWM using a symmetrical suboscillation method.
control.common.duty_ratios(u, u_dc)¶

Duty ratios for three-phase PWM using a symmetrical suboscillation method.

Parameters:

  • u (complex) – Voltage space vector (typically reference value).

  • u_dc (float) – DC-bus voltage (typically measured value).

Returns:

d_abc – Duty ratios (typically reference values).

Return type:

ndarray, shape (3,)

class control.common.PWM(pars)¶

This class contains the duty ratio computation and the voltage estimation. The voltage estimate is computed from the duty ratio references, taking the delay effects into account.

__call__(self, u_ref, u_dc, theta, w)¶

Computes the duty ratio references and updates the state.

Parameters:

  • u_ref (complex) – Voltage reference in synchronous coordinates.

  • u_dc (float) – DC-bus voltage.

  • theta (float) – Angle of synchronous coordinates.

  • w (float) – Angular frequency of synchronous coordinates.

Returns:

d_abc_ref – Duty ratio references.

Return type:

ndarray, shape (3,)

output(self, u_ref, u_dc, theta, w)¶

Computes the duty ratio references and the limited voltage reference.

update(self, u_ref_lim)¶

Update the voltage estimate for the next sampling instant.

Parameters:

u_ref_lim (complex) – Limited voltage reference in synchronous coordinates.

class control.common.SpeedCtrl(pars)¶

Speed controller with the disturbance-observer structure. This controller is mathematically equivalent to the 2DOF PI speed controller.

output(self, w_M_ref, w_M)¶

Computes the torque reference and the load torque estimate.

Parameters:

  • w_M_ref (float) – Rotor speed reference (in mechanical rad/s).

  • w_M (float) – Rotor speed (in mechanical rad/s).

Returns:

  • tau_M_ref (float) – Torque reference.

  • tau_L (float) – Load torque estimate.

update(self, tau_M, tau_L)¶

Updates the integral state.

Parameters:

  • tau_M (float) – Realized (limited) torque reference.

  • tau_L (float) – Load torque estimate.

__str__(self)¶

Return str(self).

class control.common.RateLimiter(pars)¶

A class used to implement a rate limiter.

__call__(self, u)¶
Parameters:

u (float) – Input signal.

Returns:

y – Rate-limited output signal.

Return type:

float

Notes

In this implementation, the falling rate limit equals the (negative) rising rate limit. If needed, these limits can be separated with minor modifications in the class.

class control.common.Datalogger¶

This class contains the data logger.

save(self, data)¶

Save the solution.

Parameters:

data (dictionary or Bunch object) – Data to be saved.

post_process(self)¶

Transform the lists to the ndarray format.

motulator
